data.eml:eml: Revision of the subgenus Stigmatodipogon Ishikawa of the genus Dipogon Fox (Hymenoptera: Pompilidae: Pepsinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shimizu, Akira, Lelej, Arkady S., Loktionov, Valery M., Nishimoto, Yutaka, Endo, Tomoji (2018): Revision of the subgenus Stigmatodipogon Ishikawa of the genus Dipogon Fox (Hymenoptera: Pompilidae: Pepsinae). Zootaxa 4514 (1): 1-22, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4514.1.1
